article_title: Why Blue Cross Hates Anthem's Cigna Deal

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: You’re hearing crickets from inside the headquarters of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association’s headquarters in the 200 block of North Michigan Avenue in Chicago when the topic of health plan mega mergers arises these days. That’s because it’s largest member company, Anthem (ANTM), may be causing anxiety for fellow [...]
